messages.msgSnippet: Why do males all like power tools?  lol Power tools.  Like my vacuum cleaner, blender, stand mixer, food processor?  Not to mention my electric screwdriver,
messages.messageBody:
"Why do males all like power tools? lol"

Power tools. Like my vacuum cleaner, blender, stand mixer, food processor? Not to mention my electric screwdriver, power saw (shared ownership with husband), and drill press? :)

A m y

messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] tools
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 1/17/2004 10:41:58 AM Eastern Standard Time, UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes: Why do males all like power tools?  lol I think
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 1/17/2004 10:41:58 AM Eastern Standard Time,
UnschoolingDiscussion@yahoogroups.com writes:
"Why do males all like power tools? lol"

I think people in general like power tools! I do anyway.
Our society has made little girls intimidated by items like that (in the
past, still evident though) but I think most people are pretty drawn to a machine
that can turn a piece of wood into a useful, interesting item. Or the way a
reciprocal saw can demolish most anything...that's cool stuff!!<<<


Just give me a nail gun! PLEASE! Boy, is that one testosterone-laden tool!
<G> I LOVE it!

~Kelly
